Texts.Chs:
发现于弗莱彻草茎上的寄生虫。能将唾液转化为致幻剂。
^cyan;+^white;30 ^cyan;EP^gray;, ^cyan;重度醉酒^gray;, ^red;致疯^gray;, ^reset;(^white;220s^reset;)
Texts.Eng:
Parasites found on fletchweed. Converts saliva into hallucinogens.
^cyan;+^white;30 ^cyan;EP^gray;, ^cyan;Heavily Intoxicated^gray;, ^red;Insanity^gray;, ^reset;(^white;220s^reset;)
